html:
The stone altar
Where a sorcerer
Sips blood of innocent
Skull ornaments all over it
Designed by a vicious
Used by mad and evil
So much blood
Went trough it
It exist to worship evil
To perform it
To experience it
And to share it
We will find the altar
Break it to peaceâ€™s
And punish everyone
Responsible for it
title: Altar
